description: Individual research studies. A research topic approval form must be submitted before enrolment can be completed. Contact School for details. Students completing the course over a single semester enrol in PLAN7400. Students completing over a year and commencing in sem 1 enrol in PLAN7410 for sem 1 and sem 2; commencing in sem 2 enrol in PLAN7420 for sem 2 and the following sem 1; commencing in summer sem enrol in PLAN7430 for summer sem and the following sem 1; commencing in sem 2 enrol in PLAN7440 and the following summer sem.
prerequisites: Permission of Head of School + PLAN7113
